title: The Chaos Tokens
body: Okay so I purchased the Way of Chaos pass to unlock the icon for the border. But after you finish all the missions you still wont have enough tokens. The border is the only thing I wanted and i wanted to earn it not buy it so I decided to do the missions. So I was wondering if there is a way to get enough tokens without having to purchase them?

replies.body: You can still get more tokens by doing missions! You'll be able to complete different daily missions each day, and after a couple days you should have more than enough to get that icon/border!
OK thank you I really appreciate it.
